thread.title: Mark Carney 'wrong to wade in' to EU debate, says former Chancellor Lord Lawson
thread.title_full: Mark Carney 'wrong to wade in' to EU debate, says former Chancellor Lord Lawson - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Mark Carney 'wrong to wade in' to EU debate, says former Chancellor Lord Lawson
text: Mark Carney was wrong to "wade in” to a political debate about the EU referendum, former Conservative chancellor Lord Lawson has said. The governor of the Bank of England delighted those in favour of Britain staying in the European Union by highlighting the economic benefits of membership. He said the UK economy had “broadly” benefited from the “openness and dynamism” afforded by its EU membership and said the country had been the “leading beneficiary” of the free movement of goods, services and capital across the EU.
